resources.title: Braspag Payment Gateway
resources.paymentMethodsHelpText: Choose the payment methods in the store.
resources.paymentProviderQueryEndpointHelpText: Payment provider transactional query endpoint, i.e.: payments queries.
resources.paymentProvider3dsAuthenticationEndpoint: Payment provider 3DS authentication endpoint, i.e.: get access token to do authentication.
resources.paymentProvider3dsAuthenticationClientId: 3DS - Credential Client ID of payment provider
resources.paymentProvider3dsAuthenticationClientSe: 3DS - Credential Client Secret of payment provider
resources.creditCardProviderHelpText: Credit card provider at the payment provider.
resources.cashProviderHelpText: Cash provider at the payment provider.
resources.cashProvidersCustomFieldsHelpText: Choose the custom fields to ticket provider
resources.automaticCaptureHelpText: Automatic capture of the transactions after authorization (Obs: This field will be used when the transaction not contain fraud analysis and was been made with credit card. Automatic capture exclusive to integrations just with the payment provider)
resources.useAntiFraudAnalysisHelpText: Realize antifraud analysis during the transaction.
resources.useNativeIntegrationHelpText: Use native integration Braspag with antifraud Cybersource
resources.antifraudProviderFirstOperationHelpText: First operation that Payment Gateway will do. Analyze: anti fraud analysis / Authorize: payment authorization.
resources.antifraudProviderSecondOperationHelpText: Second operation that Payment Gateway will do. Analyze: anti fraud analysis / Authorize: payment authorization.
resources.antifraudProviderMerchantIdHelpText: MerchantID credential of anti fraud provider.
resources.antifraudProviderCaptureOnLowRiskHelpTex: Automatic capture transactions with low risk when anti fraud return an positive response. Obs: Used only when the integration is between (Payment provider Braspag + Antifraud Cybersource with native integration).
resources.antifraudProviderVoidOnHighRiskHelpText: Automatic cancel/refund transaction with high risk when anti fraud return an negative response. Obs: Used only when the integration is between (Payment provider Braspag + Antifraud Cybersource with native integration).
resources.antifraudProviderSequenceCriteriaLabel: Sequence criteria which the second opereation will be done.
resources.antifraudProviderSequenceCriteriaHelpTex: Always - The second operation always will be done,  OnSuccess - The second operation just will be done if the first operation was completed successfully.
